trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a property or event should be displayed in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性 (Property) 或事件是否應該顯示於 [屬性] 視窗中。

trans-unit.source: A visual designer typically displays in the Properties window those members that either have no browsable attribute or are marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor's `browsable` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具通常會顯示在 [屬性] 視窗中的成員，或是有沒有可瀏覽屬性標示<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的`browsable`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: These members can be modified at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這些成員可以在設計階段修改。

trans-unit.source: Members marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor's `browsable` parameter set to `false` are not appropriate for design-time editing and therefore are not displayed in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 成員標示<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的`browsable`參數設定為`false`不適用於設計階段編輯，因此不會顯示在視覺化設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with `Browsable(true)`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與`Browsable(true)`，這個屬性的值設定為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: For a property marked with `Browsable(false)`, the value is <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 為屬性標記為`Browsable(false)`，這個值是<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您在程式碼中檢查這個屬性的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example marks a property as browsable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會標示為可瀏覽屬性。

trans-unit.source: The next example shows how to check the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> for `MyProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例示範如何檢查的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>如`MyProperty`。

trans-unit.source: First, the code gets a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> with all the properties for the object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，程式碼會取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>含有物件的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code indexes into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to get `MyProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，程式碼索引到<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>取得`MyProperty`。

trans-unit.source: Then it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會傳回這個屬性的屬性，並將其儲存屬性變數。

trans-unit.source: The example presents two different ways of checking the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示兩個不同的方式檢查值<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: In the second code fragment, the example calls the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個程式碼片段中，此範例會呼叫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the last code fragment, the example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> property to check the value.
trans-unit.target: 在最後的程式碼片段中，此範例會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>來檢查值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you marked a class with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, use the following code to check the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已將具有類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>，使用下列程式碼来檢查的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a property or event can be modified at design time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在設計階段可以修改屬性或事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor of the value `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式值的`true`，這個屬性的值設定為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: For a property marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor of the value `false`, the value is <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 以屬性標記的<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式值的`false`，這個值是<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您想要檢查您的程式碼中的此屬性的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example marks a property as browsable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會標示為可瀏覽屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, sets its value to <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and binds it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會建立新<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>，設定其值為<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>，並將它繫結至屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an object is browsable.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示物件是否為可瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is browsable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件是可瀏覽則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks to see whether `MyProperty` is browsable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查以查看是否`MyProperty`瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: First the code gets the attributes for `MyProperty` by:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會先取得的屬性`MyProperty`的：

trans-unit.source: Retrieving a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> with all the properties for the object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>含有物件的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indexing into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to get `MyProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 編制<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>取得`MyProperty`。

trans-unit.source: Saving the attributes for this property in the attributes variable.
trans-unit.target: 屬性變數中儲存這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Then the code sets `myAttribute` to the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection> and checks whether the property is browsable.
trans-unit.target: 然後程式碼集`myAttribute`值<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>中<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection>，並檢查是否可瀏覽屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute" />, which is <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute" /> 的預設值，就是 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes" />。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="static" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with this value, this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您要標示屬性與這個值時，這個屬性設為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您想要檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Another object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示這個執行個體和指定的物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 等於這個執行個體則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this attribute is the default.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個屬性是否為預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性是這個屬性類別的預設值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property or event cannot be modified at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定在設計階段不可以修改的屬性或事件。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="static" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor of the value `false`, this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式值的`false`，此屬性設為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.No?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property or event can be modified at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定在設計階段可以修改的屬性或事件。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="static" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: This field is the default setting for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是此屬性的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor of the value `true`, this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性標記與<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式值的`true`，此屬性設為常數成員<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定屬性做為<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
